name: colortrivia
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color trivia
des: The user can use this skill by saying "open color trivia" to Alexa or by saying "Alexa color trivia". This skill is used to show that Alexa can ask a basic color question and respond to that question. This skill will ask the user for their favourite color.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
